body:

Adf, your credit has been accepted.
          You are now a guaranteed recipient of a $10,000.00 credit line. If you click now, youll also qualify for a separate $1,500.00 cash advance that can be deposited into your account within 24 hours. There are no credit checks, no income requirements, no employment verification, and no turn downs. Click Here Now!
